If you do know here's the thing you were looking for. its short but Its got about the same amount of info that the other mysteries do. Its really cool to me that you, whoever you are, bothered to try and figure these out. Thank you!

title: 7 Minutes (Short Story)
description: How would you imagine two socially anxious people meeting each other for the first time? Not so much conversation right? Well thats exactly how these two meet up but as minutes went by... it became more than just conversation...

title: Stay Away
description: A short story that follows an alien, Ziquecha, through one of his days as a guard of a quarantine zone.

title: No Potential
description: System, tutorial, ranks, potential, it all sounds great to Samuel Garth, a young man in college, but the reality is much, much worse than he imagined. Death is expected for him and his colleagues. The system has deemed that he has no potential for growth, and so he must endure hellish conditions just to survive the easiest challenges the tutorial has.(Inspired by Hell Difficulty Tutorial, it's very good go read it)

title: Sword Witch Book One
description:
Nariko Kelly awakens into a life that is not her own, with a face she barely recognizes, as a member of a family she has never met, and her last fleeting memories an indistinct dream of condemnation. Lost in a world that expects her to be someone she is not, things turn even worse when a sword-wielding demon appears and demands she fight him! And then a magical girl attacks?! What madness has this new life hurled her into?!
Transform, Sword Witch, and carve a path to the truth!
Updates every Sunday!

title: How to Profit From a Fantasy World
description:
Waking up naked before a giant was not something Erik Park expected to happen to him. Nor was getting revived in a new world. But hey, now he's got a chance to do all the things he's read about in books, right?
Except... with a less-than-normal companion, the most restrictive abilities, and never being able to predict what happens next, Erik finds himself less worried about ever defeating the Demon King and more concerned about getting rich.
*Pokes fun at many tropes in stories; just a series for me to let loose. Perfect if you're looking for something to pass the time without thinking too much about it.**Uploads once a week, occasionally may upload several chapters at a time.**Available on Scribblehub: https://www.scribblehub.com/series/1116608/how-to-profit-from-a-fantasy-world/ *

title: Akiregom: Flame Of The Lost
description:
Raised by dragons and unknowing of  his heritage, Queltsom Worldguest finds himself imprisoned in an unfamiliar small town, away from anyone he has ever known. Although he is blind, he is in no way helpless.  Tought many things by the dragons who cared for him, he will have to use his knowledge and experience to face the challenges coming his way. He also needs to know who in the blasted Blight he really is.Ken Rio Valdris, formerly known as Arthur Green, was isekaied from Earth into a magical world they call the Omnis of the Emerald moon. That was 6 months ago. Things have turned quiet and uneventful, but they are about to be thrust into chaos once again. This world does not treat those who stagnate in their cultivation well, and Ken will have to grow stronger in order to survive. He also hasn't forgotten the score he has to settle with a nightmarish enemy.Those two will have to work together and form a team if they want to thrive in the Omnis and the Cosmos beyond.***info***  This is a rewrite of my old work Karitsu: The Last Sovereign, hopefully better written and formatted. After long periods of me stuck manually formatting the novel with html code that RR processes and renders, I have been helpfully advised to use Microsoft Word, which is accessible enough to screen readers to actually allow me to select and format the selections accurately. The novel is a litrpg custom cultivation epic fantasy. I would love it if you guys rated, commented and reviewed it, helping me be a better writer.
Posting schedule: my regular will be once per week, unless I manage to squeeze some chaps early. I'll try to write faster than I publish, so hopefully I'll get a backlog that allows me to speed the schedule up. Bear with me and apologies.
Thanks for reading Akiregom: Flame Of The Lost.

title: Deep Desert Dungeon
description:
'I will survive.'
This is the mantra of a dungeon that, unfortunately, had been placed in the middle of nowhere, inside a giant desert.
While had had struggled in the harshness of the desert to survive, he was content with being alone with only the occasional intuder.
However, after waking up from a period of dormancy, he realized that he was about to get intruders.
Many intruders.
Time for war! Joy.

title: Arcane Cataclysm
description:
Awakening to the devastation wrought by an unfathomable event, Ethan Brooks finds himself thrust into a world where humanity is teetering on the brink of extinction. Amidst the ashes of civilization, survival becomes Ethan's sole imperative, his every breath a battle against the encroaching darkness.
From the crumbling remnants of his once-familiar school and hometown to the vast, desolate wilderness stretching beyond, Ethan is a lone figure navigating a landscape ravaged by forces beyond comprehension. Each step forward is a struggle, every heartbeat echoing the desperate rhythm of a world torn asunder.
In this harsh and unforgiving reality, Ethan is compelled to shed his humanity, to confront challenges that dwarf his own existence. Against impossible odds, he must forge ahead, drawing upon reserves of courage and resourcefulness he never knew he possessed.

Notes:
I am also sharing this on the r/HFY subreddit on Reddit.
Link: Arcane Cataclysm

title: Dungeons and Dragons Adventures
description:
Follow Edward, Edalyn, and Edison, a Fighter, Cleric, and Magic-User trio, as they go on many adventures throughout the land of Greyhawk (often biting off more than they can chew).
A planned collection of self-contained short stories loosely based on the settings of Advanced Dungeons and Dragons modules.

title: The Woven Legacy
description:
In the Mistry family, magic awakens at sixteen, manifesting in unique ways. Off Mistry, yearning for his own magic, feels like a disappointment compared to his fire-starting, shadow-dancing siblings. However, on his sixteenth birthday, a faint thrumming awakens within him, revealing a new kind of magic - empathy.
Off can sense and manipulate the emotions of others. As he explores his power, he helps a wilting rose bloom with positive emotions and learns to navigate the overwhelming currents of feeling in crowded spaces. With guidance from his wise grandmother, Off starts to control the flow of emotions, becoming a filter for the chaos around him.
This newfound power sets Off on a unique path within the Mistry family. Uncharted territory for the Mistrys, Off's empathy holds immense potential, and he is determined to learn its limits and possibilities.

title: A Wizard's Journey into Darkness
description:
The tale of the wizard Asmin as he plunges the depths of the astral plane, in search of scholarly knowledge of the worlds beyond men. What he found was not what he expected, instead of returning to Etterdam as a great explorer. He found himself transformed into a demon and bound to a vengeful wizard eager to use his demonic powers on her enemies. Damned to the Abyss, Asmin must use all his wits and skills to keep his head less heaven and hell strike him down. 
A progression fantasy fan fiction based on the events and setting of J. L. Langland’s Demons of Astlan. 
Demon's of Astlan Wikia

title: Gathered From the Meadow
description:
A collection of short stories taking place in and around the small seaside town of Violet Meadows, many coming from other stories in the series. The thoughts, emotions and experiences that could not be contained in their original stories can be found here.
Updates infrequently.

title: Unstable : DORMANT
description:
Once upon a time, there was a big planet. Full of life. But soon it decayed. The animals went extinct. Nature disappeared. The only surviving species was the Norians. By genetically modifying their dna and developping technologies good enough to artificially create plants, recycle the air, recycle food, they were able to survive. 
But they modified their dna too much. And you can't mess with the laws of nature. They weren't able to reproduce anymore. The babies would die at birth. No exception. To solve that problem, the Unity project was launched. Leaded by Alayna Idliome, they were trying to merge AI and robotics to a norian baby intra utero. Unfortunately the project failed and became illegal.
Until one night, when Alayna's daughters: Enma and Aeri, stole her mother's car, crashed into a house and burned down. To save her daughters in extremis, she had to do the one thing that the government forbade her to do...

title: Life Mage [LitRPG/Slice of Life/Healer Mage]
description:
Aeryth always dreamed of becoming a mage. Her wish came true. She was granted the power of life. 
Then, the tragedy struck. A rogue army of Death Knights descended upon their village. Aeryth lost everything except for her life. A traveling healer saved her. 
Now, she must adapt to her new life in Lesterforge—a city that challenges her common sense at every step—as she learns about her magic power and stands on her own feet.
Aeryth is prepared to do everything in her power to awaken the magic she has, and she might not even need to look far—just at the 'run of the mill' library she is supposed to work in. 
The story starts with a tragedy, but most of the story will have a lighter tone. 
What to expect: 
- Slice of Life/Drama. - Character Focused Narrative  - Weak to Strong. - Slow burn progression. - And, hopefully, an interesting story.

title: Borrowed Time
description:
"I feel like I'm on borrowed time," I whispered, my eyes tracing the names etched into the stone. My allies, my friends, rested here because of the path I'd chosen.

The earlier chapters will be slow and action from the main character will start a bit late. I want to dive into the world's issues and be more in-depth about it. The novel will receive frequent updates (probably 5 chapters a week) until it reaches a point where I'm satisfied with it and slow down the uploads.

title: Seeker, NPC
description:
Discovering a reality overlay can't be good if others are killing to keep it secret.
In the world of Genesis, feudal empires rule the world, and nobles are above the law.
On the western edge of the known world, in the shadow of the Ironcrest Mountains, lies Lapidara, a remote village where life flows as predictably as the seasons. The blacksmith's apprentice discovers an ancient crystal skeleton wearing an alms purse embroidered with a set of strange symbols, untouched by time and decay. And that one small event begins the avalanche of events unlocking the secrets of a bygone era, a reality never imagined, and a magical legacy tied to the stars themselves.
"Where ancient secrets and virtual realities collide, a hero's legacy is born. This is an amazing story, and is officially my favorite LitRPG of all time." - Tim M.
Schedule: 1+ chapter(s) a week.Avg chapter length: 2500 words
Tags and content warnings mainly give me the freedom to go where I need to go if I need to go there. But really, this stuff would be rated PG-13 if it were a Hollywood movie.
This is being released as an audiobook podcast on Spotify (and many other podcaster sites), early access at ReamStories.com/Seeker, eventually as eBooks and audiobooks, and, of course, here on RoyalRoad.

title: The Heavenly Demon's Journey to the Magic World
description:
The Heavenly Demon died at the hands of his comrades due to his opposition of the Ascension to Immortality.
The people whom he trusted the most betrayed him and pierced their swords into his different parts of his body. His heart, body, soul, different organs and even legs and arms. 
Feeling the eerie death's door hanging around him. Before he died, he wished subconsciously to the Heavenly Spirit for a second chance...
And he woke up, he finds himself into the World of Magic and Swordmanship.
Can he survive this peculiar world?
Can he adapt in this strange world?
And can he reached the peak and take revenge on the people who betrayed him?

title: Unbegotten
description:
Amidst churning gears and the billowing steam, who among the Extractors can resist the madness?Amidst the rat race and the calls for bloodshed, who among the mortals has the grit to resist corruption?They are themselves deities but none dare refer to themselves as gods.
I opened my eyes to a world teeming with wonders. Some argue it’s science, just not yet understood. Most simply call it mysteries.
Firearms thundered, cannons roared and battleships prowled the seas. The age Hydro begins. Meanwhile, invasion engines thrummed in the shadow world. Potions, divinations, curses, sealed artifacts, smith mastered artifacts, national treasures and the smell of freedom and equality.
Thus unfolds the saga of He who has come to be known as: Ungeboren.

title: a madman adrift in a flock of sheep (attempt one)
description:
disclaimer 1: i have not actually written this properly just like my friend, quality is not quarantined its just a bit of fun since a friend of mine seemed to enjoy doing this.
disclaimer 2: as the main character of this is an ex mafia member there will be some graphic descriptions, gore, blood, misery etc.
disclaimer 3: I'm a whimsical creature and therefore do not be so sure i wont just drop this and gap it randomly.
attempt one will be based off of the concept of a transmigrated mafia member in a magic world, i saw this very poorly executed once and will be trying my best to implement it in a better way(taking inspiration for the idea and the idea only), as my name implies I'm calling the execution terrible when my execution is going to be much the same.
start point: childhood
systems: mages and warriors who engrave runes into their skin to be able to control an etheric energy to either enhance themselves or control parts of the world
plan: starts off at childhood where mc gets education( the bulk of the world building will happen for the early game here.) then we move on to growing power which will happen after mc has graduated, after personal character growth is growing his faction and territory(a head cannot be without its body) and after that is a lot of not so pg. things I'm not sure i can put in here so read and find out,
chapters will be out every Friday, quantity per week will be from 0-5 chapters(i will see how things go)

title: VASUNDHARA REALM - 2
description:
Thirteen years ago, Sanand, the mighty king of Shambhala, was betrayed by his loved ones. On the brink of death, he sacrificed his soul to his ancestors, vowing revenge. 
Now, in the form of an enigmatic teenager named Shiyan, he embarks on a journey to become the strongest soul warrior. 
As Shiyan trains, fragments of his past life return, unveiling his identity as Sanand. Fueled by the memories of betrayal, he sets out on a relentless quest for vengeance. But soon he finds deep within his soul lies a dormant and formidable power, a force capable of consuming gods. This imprisoned entity lingers on the edge of becoming either Shiyan's greatest power or his most terrifying enemy.
Haunted by his past and the ominous power within, Shiyan faces a perilous path. Will he master the darkness inside and fulfill his vengeful oath, or will he be devoured by the very evil he seeks to unleash? In a world where trust is shattered and power tempts the soul, Shiyan must confront the ultimate test of his strength and resolve.

title: Rise of the Superstar
description:
Orphaned at a young age, Song Minwoo found solace and a new home with a kind-hearted guardian. Years later, driven by ambition, Min-woo sets out to carve his path to success. Just as he begins to achieve his dreams, an unexpected system awakens within him, presenting both extraordinary abilities and unforeseen challenges. 
Will Min-woo master this newfound power and overcome the obstacles it brings? Can he fulfill his deepest wishes? This is the gripping tale of Song Minwoo's relentless journey to the top.

title: Penance: Prison Of The Gods
description:
Penance is a prison for gods whose power must be kept in check—a halfway point between heaven and hell for those who failed to find salvation at death.
As Rod makes his way through this dungeon, he slowly recovers his memories that were fractured at death. But as he dives deeper and deeper into the dungeon, he’ll get involved in the machinations of the gods and learn that some secrets should have stayed dead. After all, the Good don’t need repentance.  
— Penance: Prison of the Gods.
           A Rogue-Lite Lit-rpg adventure.This is a LITRPG with stat windows and lots of loot. It is also a romance story at its core, though it will take a couple of books to get there. I will update twice daily after launch day, starting on June 17th, and then once daily, starting July 2nd.

Art by Aradekudraws

title: Wasteland Conqueror
description:
Dom, a man in his mid-twenties, suddenly gets reincarnated into the harsh post-apocalyptic world of his favorite game series, Wastelander. With his previous life ended and his new one just beginning he needed a new goal to strive for, and so with an ambitious heart, he decided to pursue the monstrous goal of conquering the wasteland in its entirety that has been left scarred by atomic fire for some two centuries.
On his journey through this new world, he’ll come face to face with all sorts of dangers ranging anywhere from mutants wanting to tear any human they come across to shreds for a quick meal to bandit clans that love to rape, pillage, and sell their victims into slavery.
Despite those prevalent threats seeming dangerous enough to deter most from even attempting to set foot outside the confines of whatever safe haven they have, they're not even the worst of what he’ll come across in the pursuit of his goals. Dom’s quest will have him go toe to toe with the many powers that exist across the wasteland and their armies in his quest to one day conquer it. Will Dom achieve his dreams in this life or will he succumb to the many dangers that exist within the wasteland and beyond?

title: Legacies Of Legends: Einstein's Saga
description:
In a world whereby the Cataclysmic Descent began a thousand years ago. This follows the journey of a young boy by the name Einstein.
Various mysteries sermed to surround Einstein. His parents sudden dissapearance 5 years ago, or is it the mysterious trial ground left behind by them. Or the various high level artifacts inherited by him.
Yet Einstein wasn't able to make use of anyone of them.
Why??
Simple...simply because he's a trash. Unable to awaken his mana spark unlike other Awakeners or mana cultivators. Despite possessing immense wealth, Einstein was destined to stay at the bottom of the food chain.
Yet this changed on one fateful day.
The day he completed the trial left behind by his parents, everything changed.
Not only did he gain the unknown potion, he also fused with the mysterious and enigmatic being of the virtual world.
Upon awakening, Einstein found out that not only had he became an awakener or cultivator...but he had become a supreme cultivator.
Now empowered with an unknown talent that most could only dream of having, and with the aid of the enigmatic being later reavealed to be the Bio-Nanotech system.
Einstein embarks on the path to grow stronger and uncover the hidden secrets behind the sudden dissapearance of his mom and dad.

title: Rewrite: A Writer's Frustration
description: Jason an average writer, finally got his big chance to create his own book and become famous. Using his fancy Pen name he's been thinking about for years. But now the entire world has been combined with his novel on the whims of the system to spice up the new universe he's going to release like nothing the previous multiverses have seen. Will Jason be able to keep drinking his coco, while he fights growing dangers. As reaches for higher heights seeing the world he had the influence in creating.

title: The patched up magic
description:
This is a world like many others.
With a planet called Earth A place where wonderful and terrible things happen on a daily basis But we are not following the usual protagonist. The teenage boys, girls or theys Whom usually take the spotlight, We won't be following no homosapien Or even Felines of some discretion will be following what most people would think as junk.
Because for now The only tethers To Normality is The will to survive,The hope of a better tomorrow And Not falling apart.
===============================
Hello I I would like to know what I could improve because this is my first fiction here.

title: In Love With a Japanese Girl
description: Fifteen-year-old Alex Martienez's life is turned upside down when he moves from a tough neighborhood in the United States to the bustling metropolis of Tokyo, Japan. Leaving behind everything he's ever known, Alex is thrust into a world of unfamiliar customs, a new language, and the challenges of adapting to a different culture. On his first day at his new high school, Alex feels like a fish out of water until he meets Yui Nakamura, a friendly and approachable classmate who speaks English. Yui takes Alex under her wing, helping him navigate the intricacies of Japanese culture, school life, and everyday routines. As their friendship blossoms, Alex starts to feel more at home in this foreign land. However, things get complicated when Reina Takahashi, a new transfer student, arrives and shows interest in Alex. Caught in a web of cultural misunderstandings, personal growth, and budding romance, Alex must find a way to balance his feelings for Yui while dealing with Reina's unexpected revelations and his own identity struggles. As Alex and Yui's bond deepens through shared experiences, school festivals, and heartfelt confessions, they must confront external pressures, personal insecurities, and the complexities of their growing relationship. With graduation approaching, they face the ultimate test of their love and commitment.

title: the fallen empire
description: the great azeldian empire who lead humanity through dark times is about to fall.in the everden grand ducky a boy was born ill and weak  , las von everden he got kicked out and became a viscount in the north will he rise or fall will he save the old empire or not this is the story of the man given the name shield of the people in another dark era

title: Curse' Fairytale
description: Myce was inlove with Fairytale even though he knew it may hurt him once realism strike him. Yet, he doesnt care about that, cause' all this time, he knew—he was already curse.

title: Wildest Dreams
description: Isabella valencia was a girl who was always fascinated by the mysteries of history. She only took her fascination to another level when she shifted int an old house in the outskirts.

title: Bite
description: Arkania, a hectic world where everyone rushes through their lives and activities. Very vibrant during the days and during the night. Cyrus find himself constantly lying to everyone he loves, and coward in front of adversity. Until the day he learns he is marked by the Bureau. Running for his life, he stumbles on a lady that will forever change his reality, throwing it on a new track when he enters a villa.  The howling of those mysterious people within in the nights. Those individuals with abilities that defy common reasons. Those people called the Bites. Cyrus must survive this new way of leaving while finding an imaginary artefact called the primordial canine. Unfortunately, his inner demons catch him back Paralyzed by fear, his life takes a drastic turn when his loved ones are caught into the chaos threatened by mortal danger. The karmic Monster are catching up tearing the city on their way. Will he be able to survive his new life, find the primordial canine, vanquish the karmic monster and save his loved ones? eager to find out? let’s go for a crazy tour in Arkania.

title: Scattered Destiny -White-
description: Leo, the newest addition to Class E, brings with him a sense of curiosity and determination that sets him apart from his classmates. As he navigates the unfamiliar territory of his new environment, Leo's presence disrupts the status quo, stirring dormant emotions and hidden truths that have long been buried beneath the surface. With a fresh perspective and an unwavering resolve, Leo seeks to forge connections and unravel the mysteries that shroud Class E, determined to uncover the truth and bring light to the shadows that lurk within. Despite facing skepticism and resistance from his peers, Leo's earnestness and compassion shine through, leaving an indelible mark on those around him as he embarks on a journey of self-discovery and redemption.

title: Sleepy Scribbles
description: Supposedly Scribbles is the written equivalent to doodling, and I have a hankering to doodle with words from time to time, so I thought I'd put them here instead of keeping them in my head to be forgotten.  Especially if they're simple or dead end ramblings I make because i'm too tired or sleepy to weave actual stories further.

title: A Tale of two Hearts
description:
A Tale of Two Hearts
In the bustling city of Veridian, two lives ran parallel yet worlds apart. In the heart of the city, where skyscrapers kissed the heavens and wealth flowed like a river

title: FRACTURED SAMSARA: 4320 DAWNS OF DECAY
description: In the twilight of Divinity, where shadows lengthen and the world teeters on the precipice of oblivion, two brothers stand poised at the crux of fate. Argos, with eyes that shimmer like celestial beacons, is the last echo of the world's protectors, his essence a flickering ember of hope in a dying age. His brother, Irakes, bears the chilling weight of a different legacy.Will Argos rekindle the fading embers of Divinity within Irakes, or will the darkness extinguish the last flicker of hope? In this epic saga of good versus evil, the final chapter of a timeless war unfolds, with the fate of the world hinging on the redemption of a corrupted soul and the unwavering courage of a reincarnated protector.

title: Lixarts Academy: First Year
description: In the world of Daclon, where magic thrives and fantastical beings roam. Magic is everywhere... In your home, at your school, job, it's quite literally everywhere. What happens when you don't have any magic at all? Join Dominick in his harrowing adventure as his school life jump starts with action and tragedy. He has no bounds as his spirit prevails. What he lacks in power, he has in heart. As Dominick forges ahead, he forms an unlikely bond with a group of fellow misfits, each grappling with their own insecurities and shortcomings. Together, they form a tight-knit circle of support in the face of adversity. As they go forward, they will find things that will change their lives, things that'll never make the world seem like it once was. They must find a way to overcome the obstacles of life, love, loss, tragedy, and so much more.

title: Maybe My Soulmate! (GL)
description:
This will be a slow update at first ( 1 - 3 chapters a week )and after a few weeks the number of chapters will go up depending of the view counts and reader's interest.

This is a gl novel in a xianxia cultivation novel. 
No misunderstandings , extremely fast paced romance, No other love interests.

This is the story of our two protagonists Mo Yuxin (MC) and Su Yubing(FL) who are bound by a 
Bond so strong that it transcends reality itself. They are each other's one and only soulmate, their love knows no bound. 
This is story of their journey to cultivating immortality in a world that is unfair to women , in a world that is wholly dominated by men, where strength is all that matters. Without strength , you don't even get a chance to live peacefully. 
Our mc Mo Yuxin gets a legendary inheritance from a primordial god who is also one of the oldest gods to live till date and the only one in all of multiverse. This god and her already deceased soulmate decided to leave thei inheritance to their only descendant to whom the god's soulmate left a piece of their soul.
Watch as how their journey brings about unprecedented changes to the whole world and the multiverse and their sweet and steamy love which will make your tooth ache from sweetness.

title: Corrupt Cosmic Ranger
description: In the small town of Maplewood, a powerful storm raged, causing the trees to bend and the skies to turn a sickly green. Curious and sharp-minded Max Carter ventured into the forest after seeing a mysterious white glow the night before. He discovered a pair of high-tech glasses among the wreckage of what appeared to be a crashed meteor. The glasses, with their alien symbols and intricate designs, seemed to possess a supernatural quality. When Max put them on, he experienced a surge of energy and heard a voice in his mind. The glasses activated a genetic synchronization, causing Max's vision to blur and his head to ache. However, he managed to retain the glasses and witnessed visions from distant stars, accompanied by a hunger for control and dominance. The glasses informed Max that he now had access to various alien forms and a mission to eradicate threats to the balance of the universe. Filled with determination and a newfound power, Max embraced his new abilities. He realized that the glasses were not just a tool, but a weapon. Despite the enormity of the task, Max was exhilarated by the power he possessed. Wearing the glasses, Max set out on a mission to cleanse the universe of all beings that posed a danger. He understood that he would become known not as a mere boy from Maplewood, but as a harbinger of a new era. As he walked away from the crash site, Max's mind was filled with plans and possibilities. With the Xenotech Interface, he believed he could conquer any threats the vast universe might hold.
